name: Inside Singapore Airlines First Class Suites to New York
description:
Head to https://squarespace.com/trektrendy to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code TREKTRENDY

Join me on one of the world’s best first class flights on Singapore Airlines A380 Suites. It’s really in a class of it’s own, and by SQ’s own admission, it’s beyond First Class (I reviewed their Boeing 777 earlier this year). As with all my trip reports, I’ll take you through each step of the journey. From check in, the lounge offers and then onboard. What the food is like, and of course the bed! In fact there are two bed options today on the A380, a single or double! 

As always I’ll give you my honest opinion to what it’s like to fly in one of the most luxurious flights within commercial aviation. 

0:00 - Introduction 
0:45 - Check In
2:06 - The lounge
4:16 - Getting Onboard
6:40 - Dinner
9:02 - The bathroom
10:04 - The Bed
12:44 - Landing
